answers.answer: I've had two babies  at 38 weeks, one at 37 weeks, and one at 36 weeks and 4 days. They're all healthy and fine:)
Yes I went through the exact same thing as u n my baby is perfectly fine
I had my little girl at 38 weeks completely healthy :)

question: My doctor has been saying he's thinking about taking my little one at 38 weeks cause he's nervous about keeping her til 40 weeks cause he doesn't want her to be a still birth .. I am high risk with high blood pressure and could develop preeclampsia at anytime. Anyone have your little one at 38 weeks?
title: having baby at 38 weeks
